item.description:
Looking for something to do next Saturday night? Why not join NHC'er John for rollerderby with the Connecticut Roller Girls!

This time the theme is "Mobsters vs. Cops" as CTRG continues to use their entire league all season to create mixed team face-offs.

Tickets are $10 in advance and $12 at the door. Kids under 12 free with adult admission. Doors open at 6:00 pm, and the event starts at 7:00.

Food and beer are available, and there is a also a DJ and a live band performing. John says there is plenty of room but not very
many seats, so it's a good idea to bring a folding or collapsible chair.

For more information, see the CT Roller Girls website at www.ctrollerderby.com

If you have any questions, John can be reached at 203-500-1039
item.name: "Mobsters vs. Cops" at the CT Rollerderby
